data_table.description: AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT2
variable.description: Q2. Was scan performed before of after the ARIC snack/meal? [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3A
variable.description: Q3a. Diameter measurement. Proximal aorta AP (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3B
variable.description: Q3b. Diameter measurement. Proximal aorta transverse (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3C
variable.description: Q3c. Diameter measurement. Mid aorta AP (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3D
variable.description: Q3d. Diameter measurement. Mid aorta transverse (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3E
variable.description: Q3e. Diameter measurement. Distal aorta AP (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3F
variable.description: Q3f. Diameter measurement. Distal aorta transverse (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3G
variable.description: Q3g. Diameter measurement. Fusiform aneurysm Diameter AP (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT3H
variable.description: Q3h. Diameter measurement. Fusiform aneurysm diameter transverse (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT4
variable.description: Q4. Is this exam normal, or is it potentially abnormal (> 2.8 cm infrarenal or pathology)? Aorta scan result Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5A
variable.description: Q5a. Other Potential Abnormalities. Saccular aneurysm AP (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5B
variable.description: Q5b. Other Potential Abnormalities. Saccular aneurysm transverse (cm) Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5C1
variable.description: Q5c1. Other Potential Abnormalities. Thrombus seen at proximal aorta Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5C2
variable.description: Q5c2. Other Potential Abnormalities. Thrombus seen at mid aorta Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5C3
variable.description: Q5c3. Other Potential Abnormalities. Thrombus seen at distal aorta Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5D
variable.description: Q5d. Other aortic findings Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT5E
variable.description: Q5e. Other non-aortic findings [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT6A
variable.description: Q6a. Aorta scan Rdr referred patient to ER [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT6B
variable.description: Q6b. Aorta scan Rdr alerted core lab of critical finding [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT7A
variable.description: Q7a. Reason for special notification. Alert Result: AAA>5 cm Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT7B
variable.description: Q7b. Reason for special notification. Alert Result: non-vascular finding Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT7C
variable.description: Q7c. Reason for special notification. Alert Result: vascular finding Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT7D
variable.description: Q7d. Reason for special notification. Alert Result: other problem Rdr [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]

variable.name: AAT0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [AAA Technologist Data Collection Form, AAT]
